alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Jackson, southeastern Moore, southeastern Lincoln and Franklin Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huntland to 12 miles south of Cowan. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Decherd, Estill Springs, Cowan, Huntland, Sewanee, Tims Ford Lake, Anderson, Hytop and Lexie Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
